entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 40
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 70
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
